text:
"Death Wish" is a 2018 American vigilante action thriller movie directed by Eli Roth and written by Joe Carnahan. It is the sixth installment of the "Death Wish" series and a remake of the 1974 movie of the same name starring Charles Bronson.
The movie stars Bruce Willis as Paul Kersey, a Chicago doctor who sets out to get revenge on the men who attacked his family. Vincent D'Onofrio, Elisabeth Shue, Dean Norris, Len Cariou and Kimberly Elise also star.
The movie was released by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer on March 2, 2018 with negative reviews. A sequel will be released in 2020.
